body:
I am codesigning via xcodebuild, you can checkout my boilerplate project from https://github.com/rakyll/go-xcode. The tip works fine with codesigning via go_arm_exec_darwin.

I haven't picked the commit by bisect, f4b48de3ad8d9f4f2495acc7cd7d54775b0d101f is the last commit I know I was able to codesign its binaries. I saw Russ working on Mach-O layout related CLs, one of them might be breaking the validation. I don't know why it passes via go_arm_exec_darwin.
